about.name: Alex Rodriguez
about.title: Full Stack Web Developer
about.bio: Passionate about creating beautiful, performant web experiences. Specializing in modern React applications, serverless architectures, and cloud solutions.

hero.title: Full Stack Web Developer
hero.subtitle: Crafting digital experiences with code
hero.description: I build modern, scalable web applications with a focus on user experience and performance.

experience.description: Leading frontend development for scalable React applications. Mentoring junior developers and implementing best practices for code quality and performance.
Developed full-stack web applications for startups and established brands. Worked with WordPress, Shopify, and custom React solutions.
Started my web development journey building responsive websites and learning modern JavaScript frameworks.

projects.title: Neon E-commerce Platform
projects.shortDescription: Modern e-commerce platform with real-time inventory
projects.fullDescription: A full-featured e-commerce platform built with React and Node.js. Features include real-time inventory management, payment processing, and admin dashboard.

process.title: Research & Planning
process.description: Analyzed market requirements and competitor solutions

process.title: Design
process.description: Created wireframes and high-fidelity mockups in Figma

process.title: Development
process.description: Built responsive frontend and scalable backend

process.title: Deployment
process.description: Deployed to AWS with CI/CD pipeline

projects.title: Analytics Dashboard
projects.fullDescription: An advanced analytics dashboard that provides real-time insights into user behavior and business metrics. Built with React and D3.js for data visualization.

process.title: Data Architecture
process.description: Designed MongoDB schema for efficient data queries

process.title: Backend API
process.description: Built RESTful API with real-time WebSocket support

projects.title: Portfolio Website - Webflow
projects.shortDescription: Creative portfolio site with smooth animations
projects.fullDescription: A beautifully designed portfolio website built with Webflow, showcasing creative projects and design expertise.

process.title: Brand Strategy
process.description: Developed visual identity and brand guidelines

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.fullDescription: A web-based task management application with real-time collaboration features, team workspaces, and progress tracking.

process.title: Requirements Gathering
process.description: Interviewed potential users for feature requirements

process.title: MVP Development
process.description: Built minimum viable product with core features

testimonials.name: Sarah Mitchell
testimonials.content: Alex delivered exceptional work on our e-commerce platform. His attention to detail and problem-solving skills made the entire project seamless.

testimonials.name: James Chen
testimonials.content: Working with Alex was a pleasure. He brought fresh ideas to the table and delivered a beautiful, performant dashboard that exceeded our expectations.

testimonials.name: Maria Garcia
testimonials.content: Alex's technical expertise combined with his design sensibility resulted in amazing user experiences. Highly recommend!

blog.title: Building Scalable React Applications
blog.excerpt: Learn the best practices for structuring large React applications with proper code splitting, state management, and performance optimization.
blog.content: When building scalable React applications, it's crucial to understand how to structure your code for maintainability and performance. This article covers key concepts like component composition, state management patterns, and optimization techniques that will help you build applications that can grow with your business needs...

blog.title: TypeScript Tips for Better Code
blog.excerpt: Discover advanced TypeScript patterns and techniques that will make your code more robust and easier to maintain.
blog.content: TypeScript is a powerful tool for building robust applications. In this article, we'll explore advanced patterns like utility types, generics, and intersection types that can help you write more type-safe and maintainable code...

blog.title: Modern CSS Techniques
blog.excerpt: Master the latest CSS features including Grid, Flexbox, and Custom Properties for building responsive, beautiful designs.
blog.content: CSS has evolved dramatically in recent years. With CSS Grid, Flexbox, and Custom Properties, you now have powerful tools to create responsive, elegant designs. This article explores these modern techniques and how to use them effectively...
